resources.string: CREATE TABLE [Messages] ([ID] INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, [Service] TEXT NOT NULL, [PhoneNumber] TEXT NOT NULL, [ConcactName] TEXT NOT NULL, [Message] TEXT NOT NULL, [IsTimeEnabled] SHORT NOT NULL, [Time] NUMERIC NOT NULL, [Enabled] SHORT NOT NULL)
CREATE TABLE [Templates] ([ID] INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, [Name] TEXT NOT NULL, [Value] TEXT NOT NULL)
